author: dandiep
msg: Improve IRI decoding so that templates (i.e. {id}) don't need to be bounded by '/' or '?'. CXF-394

author: schor
msg: No Jira - fix spelling errors - mostly 2 letter transpositions
caused, no doubt, by the keyboard being unable to keep up with
the super high speed typing of our development team :-)

author: deweese
msg: Added fixed bugs to CHANGES file

author: dkulp
msg: * Remove BudFactoryHelper (make factory itself a factory)
* Update Workqueue tests to ignore bug in JDK 1.6 (Java 6 ThreadPoolExecutor can drop below the low water mark for threads)
* Update TypeTest to fix one test on Java 6 (2 failures left)
* Fix HTTP logging to be multi-subclass safe
